title: Mono
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Vegan restaurant and bar, record shop, performance space, grocery shop, and lending library in the city center. Restaurant is spacious and the blackboard usually shows list of several vegan mains and starters, and 2 soups. Also sandwiches for order at the bar. Pub style food, served all day.
